name: Your End is... Cat? - LD50
description:
In Your End is... Cat? you play as someone who adopted a cat, but the cat turns out to be something more and you have to please his every whim or risk destruction.

The game is comprised of 3 other minigames, only one uses the keyboard, the remainder of the game is played with the mouse.

How long can you delay the Wrath of Seth?
